channel.title: mat_queue_mode 2 causes crashes
channel.description: As stated in the title, mat_queue mode 2 causes crashes (but fixes my performance completely until that happens). It is properly implemented in pretty much all modern source games (CS:S, TF2, CS:GO, L4D2, Portal 2), so I'm just wondering if it will at least be properly implemented soon.

item.title: mat_queue_mode 2 causes crashes
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
I don’t know honestly, maybe they’ll implement it. Does it lag a lot without it?

Read full topic

item.description:
As stated in the title, mat_queue mode 2 causes crashes (but fixes my performance completely until that happens). It is properly implemented in pretty much all modern source games (CS:S, TF2, CS:GO, L4D2, Portal 2), so I’m just wondering if it will at least be properly implemented soon.
